description: The NewRoot trap indicates that the bridge has
become the new root for this Spanning Tree instance;
the trap is sent by a bridge soon after its election
as the new root, upon expiration of the
Topology Change Timer immediately subsequent to

event.Summary: Bridge has become the new root for spanning tree instance in $v1

description: The Spanning Tree number identifying this instance. Valid
variables.name: ALCATEL-IND1-VLAN-STP-MIB::vStpNumber

description: A RootPortChange trap is sent for a Spannnig Tree
instance by a bridge when its root port has changed.
The root port is the port which offers the
lowest cost path from this bridge to the root

event.Summary: STP root port $v2 has changed in $v1

description: The Spanning Tree number identifying this instance. Valid
variables.name: ALCATEL-IND1-VLAN-STP-MIB::vStpNumber

description: The port ifindex of the port which offers the
lowest cost path from this bridge to the root
bridge for this spanning tree instance.
variables.name: ALCATEL-IND1-VLAN-STP-MIB::vStpRootPortNumber
